name: @invntrm/gaude-mon
description: [private] Show water/electricity meters for landlords (node.js port)
author: alex mextner <invntrm@gmail.com>

scripts.docker: npm version patch && docker build . -t mxtnr/gaude-mon:`node -p 'require("./package.json").version'` -t mxtnr/gaude-mon:latest && docker push mxtnr/gaude-mon
